attributes.deffile:
BootStrap: docker
From: weatherhub/metview

%labels
MAINTAINER Xin Zhang
SPECIES JCSDA

%runscript
    echo "Welcome, this is Singularity container for METVIEW"

%environments
    DISPLAY=:0.0 \
    export DISPLAY

%post
    echo "Hello from inside the container"
    echo "Install additional software here"
